Name: Chasmal
About the game: Chasmal is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Descend into a ruined machine using powerful items to overcome foes and reach the bottom of the depths. Featuring over 100 items and weapons, four playable characters, and three difficulty settings.
Meta Title: Chasmal: Jan 17, 2023, Daniel MacLeod and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Chasmal? Check out the release date (Jan 17, 2023), developer insights from Daniel MacLeod, and a complete game summary.
